title: Active and Interactive Learning Design for Integrating Nursing Education Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening patient-centered competencies through case analysis and practice of technology applications in nursing education

learning_goals: Perform patient assessment and nursing intervention procedures with 80% accuracy using virtual simulation tools
Enhance the ability to solve nursing scenarios by exchanging peer evaluations and feedback through a collaborative platform
Measure problem-solving abilities related to patient safety using self-assessment and peer-assessment methods with digital evaluation tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
